CustomSetting.UserfriendlyName: Texture filtering - Driver Controlled LOD Bias

CustomSettingValue.UserfriendlyName: GRAPH_FLIP_FPS - FPS graph, measured on display hw flip
GRAPH_PRESENT_FPS - FPS graph, measured when the user mode driver starts processing present
GRAPH_APP_PRESENT_FPS - FPS graph, measured on app present
DISPLAY_PAGING - Add red paging indicator bars to the GRAPH_PRESENT_FPS graph
DISPLAY_APP_THREAD_WAIT - Add app thread wait time indiator bars to the GRAPH_APP_PRESENT_FPS graph
Limiter V2 - Force Off [Enables Limiter V1 (Less Input Lag)]
58 FPS ( might improve inputlag on vsync 60Hz )
73 FPS ( might improve inputlag on vsync 75Hz )
118 FPS ( might improve inputlag on vsync 120Hz )
142 FPS ( might improve inputlag on vsync 142Hz )

CustomSetting.UserfriendlyName: Toggle FXAA Indicator on or off

CustomSettingValue.UserfriendlyName: Treat 'Override any application setting' as 'Enhance the application setting'
Treat 'Enhance the application setting' as 'Override any application setting'
Disable Antialiasing at NVIDIA Control Panel
On ( will be ignored if using high quality )
